inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) or biphenotypic leukemia meeting the following criteria:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Verified by morphology and confirmed by cytochemistry and immunophenotyping
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Mature B-ALL, defined by the immunophenotypical presence of surface immunoglobulins or t(8;14) and breakpoint as in B-ALL
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Presence of the t(9;22) (q34;q11) or bcr-abl fusion in the leukemic cells (if data are not known, patient still may be eligible)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago. Recent antibx use in the last month on prior admission.
